table.description: The name of the DynamoDB collection

package.description: The Java package for the generated classes

type.description: The object type of the DynamoDB document. This type must be defined in the type section.

hashKey.description: The name of the field (not the DynamoDB field name) which represents the hash key of the collection.

rangeKey.description: The name of the field which presents the range key of the collection.

ttlField.description: Field to use as TTL attribute. The TTL attributeâ€™s value must be a timestamp in Unix epoch time format in seconds.

globalSecondaryIndexes.description: An array of one or more global secondary index definitions

localSecondaryIndexes.description: An array of one or more local secondary index definitions

optimisticLocking.description: boolean: `true` or `false`, default: `false`. If `true` adds a revision field and conditional checks to updates to implement optimistic locks.

version.description: The version number of the schema.

enableMigrations.description: Are schema migrations supported for this type? Defaults to true

types.description: An array of one or more type definitions. This must include at least one entry - the definition for the type of the collection.
